page.title: 05A CHILD'S DAY IN SOUTH-AYR
page.content: My name is {Louise Marks,}I am{9}and I go to{Castlehill Primary School.}I get up at 8.00am. and have my breakfast of cornflakes, toast and orange juice. After that I get dressed for school in a grey skirt, blue blouse, grey jumper and my school tie. School starts at 9.00am. and we work until 10.30am., when we have our milk and a snack, called a{playpiece.}Then we go out to play. At 12.15pm. I go home for lunch but some children stay at school for lunch. We leave school again at 3.35pm.. I read a book and watch television until tea-time when I usually have meat and potatoes followed by yoghurt. I watch television again until it is time to go to bed at 8.45pm.. The next day starts all over again.
